sentences.sContent: The World Cup will have a prominent place on the agenda.
sentences.sCn: 世界杯赛将占据议程表的重要位置。

sentences.sContent: ...chains big enough to fall under the rule will face penalties about 2000 dollars for not showing calorie information in a prominent spot on their menus preferably next to the price...
...A prominent reason public schools did well was that many highly qualified women had few options for worldng outside the house other than being teachers or nurses...
...It is the most prominent example of a huge new "sharing economy"...
...prominent schools around the world have joined the trend...
...Internet advertising will play a more prominent role in organizations' advertising in the near ftuture...

exam.question: The most _______ technological success in the twentieth century is probably the computer revolution.

answer.explain: 句意：  计算机革命可能是20世纪最杰出的科技成果。prosperous：  繁荣的， 兴旺的； solemn：  庄严的， 肃穆的； prevalent：  流行的， 普遍的。

synos.tran: 突出的，显著的；杰出的；卓越的

remMethod.val: pro(向前， 在前) ＋ min(伸出， 突出) ＋ ent(…的) → 突出的
